channel.title: CVE Feed for Open-Xchange GmbH -- OX Dovecot Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Open-Xchange GmbH -- OX Dovecot Pro

item.title: CVE-2024-25584|2024-09-06T15:28:02.638Z -- open-xchange%20gmbh -- ox%20dovecot%20pro
item.description: Dovecot accepts dot LF DOT LF symbol as end of DATA command. RFC requires that it should always be CR LF DOT CR LF. This causes Dovecot to convert single mail with LF DOT LF in middle, into two emails when relaying to SMTP. Dovecot will split mail with LF DOT LF into two mails. Upgrade to latest released version. No publicly available exploits are known.

item.title: CVE-2024-25584|2024-09-06T15:02:48.487Z -- open-xchange%20gmbh -- ox%20dovecot%20pro

No publicly available exploits are known.
